Facebook Coin is basically a bitcoin L2 for when you don't need immutability or privacy and just wanna split dim sum eight ways with your friends. Basically American WeChat. I see this as complementary to Bitcoin (an on ramp) and adversarial to payment coins (XLM, BCH, etc).
To be fair, XLM -could- become less centralized over time. But it’ll be a long way to reach today‘s #XRP decentralization score.
